ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] where is illusion: halfling?
ygData.msgSnippet: there are multiple illusion vendors.  One in the library and one in the guild.  Check which ever one you missed before.  My guess would be that the vendor who
ygData.messageBody:
there are multiple illusion vendors. One in the
library and one in the guild. Check which ever one
you missed before. My guess would be that the vendor
who you give the Coin of Tash to sells it.

--- Daniel Devorkin <devo@...> wrote:
> ya know, I am now level 42 enchanter, and i have
> been all through Erudin,
> bought all my illusions there up to Werewolf....and
> i cannot find Halfling
> ANYWHERE in Erudin!!!
> someone told me its on the same merchant as werewolf
> but i didnt see it
> there....does anyone have its exact location?
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Mark Rafn <dagon@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 12:43 PM
> Subject: [eqenchanters] where is illusion: halfling?
>
>
> > I can also now confirm that Illusion:Erudite has
> absolutely no effect
> > except putting the spell icon in the corner.
> There really ought to be an
> > "Illusion: Change Face" spell that would randomize
> the character graphic,
> > (and an "Illusion: Leather/Chain/Plate" series
> that gave some AC and made
> > it look like you were wearing armor). Ah, well.
> >
> > Next question: is Illusion: Halfling available
> anywhere outside of Erudin?
> > I'm Currently based in Freeport (though camped in
> Highkeep after getting
> > my pet), and would like to avoid the trip. I was
> hoping to find it in
> > Neriak, but didn't see it.
> > --
> > Mark Rafn dagon@...
> <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
